オプション1: Star Man and the others arrived at the ruins.
Star Man and the others walked to Trapezoid Man's room.
A sound came from inside the room.

Peering into the room, Trapezoid Man was just getting up.
He was clenching his teeth, looking in pain.

"..."
"These are the children I mentioned earlier."

"Nice to meet you."
"Nice to meet you."
Star Man and the others handed the coconuts to Trapezoid Man.

After the greetings, they moved to another room.
It was covered in trash and dust, but they had no strength or will to clean.
"Let's rest for now... We can't do any more today."
They decided to sleep for now.
